label: Description
value: Oblong table cover of white linen with a band of cutwork used as a border. Edged with narrow needle lace worked in small points.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: withdrawn element work

label: Description
value: Long hanging of white linen with drawn work band on all four sides. Bobbin lace insertions in two narrow strips, and bobbin lace edging at ends. Design in drawn work is of a symmetrically curving vine with tulip-like blossoms in profile.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: withdrawn element with darned motifs; bobbin lace

label: Description
value: Oblong panel of very fine linen with elaborate design in fine drawn work in which the main lines of the design are reserved in linen. The background, centers of flowers and other small details are rendered in a variety of drawn thread patterns. In center, an urn with flower sprays and vines symmetrically arranged. Below is a bird, and at right and left, a symmetrical arrangement of curving vines and flowers of natural size. Lower edge is scalloped. Birds and other details are embroidered in white.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: deflected element work

label: Description
value: Oblong panel with elaborate patterns of drawn work with the main elements of the design reserved in the linen ground. Embroidered outlines and details. Symmetrical design of curving lines, flowers and vines originating from central motif. Lower edge trimmed with bobbin lace.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: deflected element and withdrawn element work

label: Description
value: Long narrow border with the lower edge embroidered in a small scale flower design in a symmetrical arrangement. Squares of cutwork with needle lace fillings are at two-inch intervals. Edges of border above and below have circles of cutwork. Lower edge trimmed with narrow bobbin lace.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: cutwork, needle made fillings, embroidery

label: Description
value: Oblong table cover of white linen with cutwork bands across the ends in simple geometric patterns and highly stylized embroidered designs in tan and blue-green. Narrow border, half inch, of cutwork and simple embroidered design surrounds the entire cover. Narrow looped fringe in the same tan and blue-green trims the piece.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: cutwork and embroidery

label: Description
value: Cover with a detached arrangement of square designs of cutwork connected with white embroidered lines forming a trellis pattern. Squares framed in white embroidered design in spear-shaped patterns. Edging of pointed bobbin lace.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: cutwork with needle fillings and embroidery, bobbin lace

label: Description
value: A shaped linen cover in plain white which has a wide border of filet lace in an elaborate, fantastic design of curving vines and flowers with a winged, four-footed beast. Edged with scalloped bobbin lace. The border is backed with course, modern net to protect it.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: filet lace, bobbin lace

label: Description
value: Reticella squares joined by a band of sheer linen with reticella insertions finished with a three-inch pointed reticella edge. The designs are circles, half circles and star shapes within circles and squares.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: needle lace (reticella) Label: linen needle lace (reticella)

label: Description
value: White cover with broad bands of net at each end with a needlework pattern in white of leaf forms and scrolls. Narrower band at the sides in a similar design. Edged with fine scalloped bobbin lace.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: needlework on knotted net, bobbin lace

label: Description
value: White cover with a wide reticella border worked with three rows of stars at each end. Narrow border in the same design at the sides. Deep pointed bobbin lace at the ends and and narrower bobbin lace eding at the sides.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: withdrawn element; bobbin lace

label: Description
value: Heavy linen altar frontal with a wide border showing a large-scale design of blossoms or pomegranates within curving circular bands reserved in linen. Narrow border of simple strapwork in the same technique. Edging of heavy bobbin lace in a scalloped design.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: withdrawn element; bobbin lace

label: Description
value: Large altar frontal with insertion bands of punto in aria in a reticella style showing an allover pattern of curving lines. Matching border with very deep points.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: grid of withdrawn element with needle lace, reticella style

label: Description
value: Table cover of fine white linen ornamented with white bands across the ends and sides. The pattern is reserved in the white linen. Edging of narrow pointed needle lace.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: withdrawn element work; needle lace

label: Description
value: Cover of white linen with wide borders of embroidered net with a design of a flowerpot with carnations and confronted peacocks on either side. Edged with scalloped bobbin lace.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: needlework on knotted net

label: Description
value: Long band of linen, pieced in four places, embroidered in blue. The design is reserved in the ground of the linen, the background solidly worked with embroidery stitches. Design consists of fantastical mermaid-like figures in profile confronted on either side of a fountain-like structure. Figures alternate with smaller-winged confronted grotesques. Narrow cream looped fringe trims the top and bottom edges.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk on linen Technique: chain and counted running stitch embroidery on plain weave

label: Description
value: Oblong cover embroidered along all four sides in a geometric pattern. Diamond shapes filled with floral motifs are embroidered in red with metallic thread accents.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk on linen, metallic lace Technique: cross stitch embroidery

label: Description
value: White linen apron pleated into a narrow band at the top. The sides and lower half of the apron are decorated with squares of cut work with needle-lace fillings alternating with squares embroidered in white in a stylized plant motif. The bottom is trimmed with scalloped needle lace.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: plain weave, embroidered with cutwork and needle lace fillings Label: linen embroidered with cutwork and needle lace fillings

label: Description
value: Long white panel embroidered in a small allover design of lacy festoons and small flowers. The long festoons have drawn centers.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: deflected element work

label: Description
value: Oblong table cover of dark green silk bordered with green net in an appliqued design of foliage in reversed scrolls that terminate in lilies. Applique is natural colored linen embroidered in dark yellow silk. Edged with natural colored needle lace.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk, linen Technique: appliqué on gauze weave, needle lace

value: Brilliant yellow satin ground with a profuse symmetrical design of silver, rose and ivory blossoms and serrated leaves in vases.

value: Medium: silk, metallic thread Technique: compound satin with supplementary weft

value: Gold ground patterned in leaf green with large symmetrical trophies of foliage and blossoms enclosed within ogives of boldly scrolling leaves and surmounting festoons of pomegranates centering on a cinquefoil.

value: Medium: silk, linen Technique: compound satin (brocatelle)

label: Provenance

value: Wide border of tan-colored silk embroidered in a floral pattern and detached allover floral sprigs. Colors are faded and now are dull red, blue and gold.

value: Medium: silk Technique: chain stitch embroidery

label: Description
value: Two lengths of blue moire with selvages in pink and yellow.

value: Violet silk faille with fine symmetrical moire on either side of a central fold. Violet silk warp with dark green silk weft.

value: Warp x Weft: 227.3 x 47 cm (7 ft. 5 1/2 in. x 18 1/2 in.)

label: Physical description
value: Carved ivory inlaid with carved mother-of-pearl and carved and stained ivory, gilded overlay

label: Description
value: Cylindrical box, rounded at bottom and slightly flaring. Cover flat, with rounded edge. Brown lacquer with grass straws in gold and relief dots in gold and silver. Relief mark on bottom.

label: Description
value: Cylindrical box with cover, made of a segment of a bamboo stem. Ferns in gold 'hira-makiye' lacquer on ground of 'shunkei-nuri' (reddish-brown) lacquer. The depressions in top and underneath are due to formation of the node of the bamboo segment. The ferm is a symbol associated with Japanese New Year's ceremonies.

label: Dimensions
value: H x diam.: 7 x 5.1 cm (2 3/4 x 2 in.)

label: Description
value: Enameled and gilt metal figurine of bald-pated man holding brass decanter and wine glass. Enameled costume: royal blue jacket with tan belt, blue waistcoat with red buttons, green breeches, white stockings, black shoes. Threaded pin for support on base of left foot.

label: Description
value: Metal figurine of bald-pated man with top knot holding bow and brown enamel violin with gold strings and edging. Enameled costume: green jacket with gray blet, royal blue waistcoat with gold buttons, light blue breeches, white stockings with red and yellow mottling, black shoes. Threaded pin on base of left foot. Traces of gilding on neck, throat and violin bow.

label: Description
value: Small picture, framed, and under glass. Shows figure of woman, kneeling before an altar, while an angel bends over her, pointing an arrow at her breast. Above, dove descending on rays of light. whole in architectural frame with canopy above. Embroidered in colored silks and some metal thread; appears to be laid work on a paper foundation. Faces and hands of engraved paper. Below: "S. Teresa da Jesus."

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk, metal threads, paper Technique: painted, metal threads laid on parchment or paper with wax
